events.title: James J. Braddock beats Max Baer

movie.title: Cinderella Man
movie.plot: The true story of boxer Jim Braddock who, in the 1920â€™s following his retirement, makes a surprise comeback in order to get him and his family out of a socially poor state.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 42 nominations.

movie.title: Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom
movie.plot: A chronicle of Nelson Mandela's life journey from his childhood in a rural village through to his inauguration as the first democratically elected president of South Africa.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 11 wins & 32 nominations.

studios.title: Industrial Development Corporation of South Africa

events.title: the 24 hour long Le Mans race starts

movie.title: Le Mans
movie.plot: Filmed during the annual 24-hour endurance race at Le Mans, Michael Delaney is a Porsche driver haunted by the memory of an accident at the previous year's race in which a competing driver was killed. Delaney also finds himself increasingly infatuated with the man's widow.

events.title: the New York Times prints the first of their articles about the leaked Pentagon Papers

movie.title: The Post
movie.plot: A cover-up that spanned four U.S. Presidents pushed the country's first female newspaper publisher and a hard-driving editor to join an unprecedented battle between journalist and government. Inspired by true events.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 19 wins & 111 nominations.

events.title: Cindy Paulson escapes from killer Robert Hansen

movie.title: The Frozen Ground
movie.plot: An Alaska State Trooper partners with a young woman who escaped the clutches of serial killer Robert Hansen to bring the murderer to justice. Based on actual events.

events.title: the Indian Army secures Tololing mountain

movie.title: LOC: Kargil
movie.plot: This film dramatizes events that occurred as the hostility between India and Pakistan over Kashmir came to a head in 1999, when more than 1,000 men crossed the "Line of Control" that separates the two locations. Taliban and Pakistani soldiers took over the area, blocking the main road that linked the regions. Standing their ground, Indian soldier drove them away, but not without losing more than 400 of their own men first.
